sentences.sContent: During the riots last year, the nighttime patrol force was beefed up with volunteers.
sentences.sContent_eng: During the riots last year, the nighttime patrol force was beefed up with volunteers.
sentences.sCn: 去年骚乱期间志愿者增加了夜间巡逻力量。

sentences.sContent: A prescription antidiuretic can cut down on nighttime urination if this is the only problem.
sentences.sContent_eng: A prescription antidiuretic can cut down on nighttime urination if this is the only problem.
sentences.sCn: 如果这是唯一的问题，抗利尿的处方可以减少夜间排尿。

sentences.sContent: "Because of these impacts, we'd like to know what happens to these nitrogen oxides in nighttime air, where do they go, what do they do," Thornton said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Because of these impacts, we'd like to know what happens to these nitrogen oxides in nighttime air, where do they go, what do they do," Thornton said.
sentences.sCn: 桑顿说：“由于这些影响，我们想知道夜间空气中的这些氮氧化物发生什么变化，到那里去，会有什么影响。”

words.tran: 三K党员；美国南部夜间骑马为非作歹的人
夜里徘徊者，梦游病患者；夜盗，夜行动物
